text: I order a family order of cheese sticks on 08/19/20 and with an order mistake I would not even complain about it in a review but there was MOLD in the marinara sauce. If you have eaten any marinara from this location on or around this day …More

text: Pretty inconsistent, I’ve had great pizza and terrible pizza from here. You just never know. The order I just got was a terrible one. You couldn’t break off a slice because the crust was so tough. Pizza barely had any sauce and not much cheese. Crust was missing seasoning.

text: This place is right around the corner from our house so we go all the time. Now, I am pretty picky about my pizza. From the sauce to the crust to the amount of cheese and the even dispersment of the toppings.
